meanings: (하고 싶다) (동사로 쓰여) want (to), would like to, wish (to), (formal) desire (to), feel like (doing)
(~한 생각이 들다) (동사로 쓰여) look, seem, appear

meanings.meaning: with the best will in the world

vlive.korean: [국물 실종][섞고 싶어도 안 섞임] - 안 섞여 - 근데 맛있는데요? [Without soup] [Can't mix it] - It's hard to mix. - But it's delicious. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
vlive.english: [Without soup] [Can't mix it] - It's hard to mix. - But it's delicious.

vlive.korean: [금방 돌아올테니] 보고 싶어도 참아~ Hold it in even if you want to see me. 듣기 View video AB6IX : AB6IX (에이비식스) DEBUT D-DAY #1
vlive.english: Hold it in even if you want to see me.

vlive.korean: 나는 더 길게 하고 싶어도 못 하는데 - 왜? I can't do it long even if I want to. - Why? 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 뉴욕은 밤이다🌌
vlive.english: I can't do it long even if I want to. - Why?

vlive.korean: 그럼 하고 싶어도 참고 사는 거예요? Then do you just hold it in even if you want to say something? 듣기 View video EXO : [FULL] 첸, 사월의 버스킹 (CHEN’s APRIL BUSKING)
vlive.english: Then do you just hold it in even if you want to say something?

vlive.korean: 가고는 싶어도... We'd love to go. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 김다영&무파사 <무엇이든 물어 보세요a.k.a아무말 대잔치> - Comet Beauty Festival 커밋뷰티페스티벌

examples.korean: With the best will in the world I could not describe him as a good father. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 아무리 하고 싶어도 그를 좋은 아버지라고 묘사할 수는 없을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: With the best will in the world I could not describe him as a good father. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Let's wait and meet on Christmas. What do you think? 듣기 Add to Wordbook (보고 싶어도) 기다렸다가 크리스마스에 만나는 거야. 어때? Neungyule
examples.english: Let's wait and meet on Christmas. What do you think? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Once the festival starts, almost no one sleeps, even if they want to. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일단 축제가 시작되면, 마을 사람들은 아무리 자고 싶어도 거의 잘 수가 없습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Once the festival starts, almost no one sleeps, even if they want to. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A growing number of Korean women cannot have a baby even though they want to because they are too old,' an NSO official said. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 점점 더 많은 한국 여성들이 나이가 너무 많은 것 때문에 아기를 갖고 싶어도 갖지 못할 수 있습니다'라고 통계청의 한 관계자는 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: A growing number of Korean women cannot have a baby even though they want to because they are too old,' an NSO official said. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It's so late that I can't stay any longer even if I wanted to. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 시간이 너무 늦어서 더 있고 싶어도 있을 수가 없다 Neungyule
examples.english: It's so late that I can't stay any longer even if I wanted to. Add to Wordbook
